data.title: ¬∞QUALITY HOTEL RIVER STATION DRAMMEN 3* (Norway) - from ‚Ç¨ 114
data.meta_description: Quality Hotel River Station - The 3-star Quality Hotel River Station Drammen is 7 minutes' stroll from Drammen Water Park and offers a snack and drink vending machine, and elevator. Along with the use of a fitness center on site, sports fans are invited to discover Marienlyst Stadion, which is only 0.
data.text:
The breakfast here was delicious and had a wide variety of options. It's great that they offer a lot of meals to choose from. üç≥ the location is convenient, right in the heart of the city. the staff members were extremely friendly and helpful, truly top-notch. No complaints whatsoever about their service.

I was really surprised by this hotel, considering the price we paid. It's conveniently located right next to the train station, which made our arrival and departure a breeze. The staff were friendly and gave us great recommendations for parking and local eateries. The room had a lovely view of the water and the mountains, and it was clean and comfortable. The breakfast spread had a wide variety of options to choose from, ensuring we started our day off right. the attention to detail and the basic amenities provided made our stay enjoyable.

Nothing to complain about, everything was just fine.

I had a wonderful stay at this hotel in Drammen! The location right next to the train station was very convenient, making it easy for me to explore the area. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel welcome from the moment I arrived. The rooms had a beautiful view out to the water, which added to the overall experience. Additionally, the breakfast that was served had a wide variety of options to choose from, ensuring that there was something to suit everyone's taste.

All aspects of this hotel exceeded my expectations.

I loved staying at this hotel! The location right next to the train station made it so easy for me to get around this city. The cleanliness of the hotel was impressive and the staff were all friendly and helpful. I also really enjoyed the breakfast ‚Äì there were so many delicious options to choose from.

Nothing all good.

This hotel is a great choice for travelers who want to be close to transportation, with the train station a stone's throw away. Rooms are modern and beds are comfortable. The breakfast buffet is impressive, and the staff is friendly and helpful.

There may be some limitations on amenities, such as no mini fridge or kettle in the room.

The hotel was located in a great area with plenty of options for dining and entertainment nearby. the modern finish of the hotel was impressive and the staff was extremely helpful and polite. I also loved the breakfast buffet which had a wide variety of choices and was something to look forward to each morning.

The family room was too small and had barely enough room to manoeuvre around the beds. the half glass shower screen flooded the bathroom floor when the shower was on, which was inconvenient.

The breakfast was delicious, and the river view was amazing. The staff was friendly and helpful with everything we needed. The location was convenient, right next to public transportation and close to several restaurants.

The room was too small and basic, and the shower flooded the bathroom floor. There was no safe, kettle or mini fridge in the room.
